channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA

item.title: Report E-2025010050
item.description:
Report E-2025010050

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T00:58:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-06
  • City: ROANOKE
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 12:44 ET, with XPO notified the Call Center of a cargo release at terminal NRO. It was reported that approximately 1 gallon of PH Down released from one 6-gallon plastic pale due to nail puncture during transportation. The release impacted Trailer #3213050. Terminal personnel cleaned up the release before contacting call center. Emergency contact, Pers Ambipar, has been contacted and report #20241209-XX-11318 was given by Jenny. Waste label 223102-1 was created, one 30 gallon poly drum containing plastic pale with leftover material and oil dri and absorbed material.
